name: @jfalava/generate-aws-inventory
description: Aplicación para generar el inventario de una cuenta de AWS dado una entrada de letme y una región

scripts.build:windows-x64: bun build --compile --minify --sourcemap --bytecode --target=bun-windows-x64-modern --define BUILD_VERSION='"0.2"' ./src/app.ts --outfile dist/generate-aws-inventory.exe && cd dist && zip generate-aws-inventory-windows-x64.zip generate-aws-inventory.exe
scripts.build:linux-x64: bun build --compile --minify --sourcemap --bytecode --target=bun-linux-x64-modern --define BUILD_VERSION='"0.2"' ./src/app.ts --outfile dist/generate-aws-inventory && cd dist && zip generate-aws-inventory-linux-x64.zip generate-aws-inventory
scripts.build:macOS-arm: bun build --compile --minify --sourcemap --bytecode --target=bun-darwin-x64 --define BUILD_VERSION='"0.2"' ./src/app.ts --outfile dist/generate-aws-inventory.app && cd dist && zip generate-aws-inventory-macos-arm.zip generate-aws-inventory.app
scripts.build:all: bun run build:windows-x64 && bun run build:linux-x64 && bun run build:macOS-arm
